columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of a logical container where backups are stored.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: An Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies a backup vault.

columns.name: creation_date
columns.description: The date and time a resource backup is created.

columns.name: creator_request_id
columns.description: An unique string that identifies the request and allows failed requests to be retried without the risk of running the operation twice.

columns.name: encryption_key_arn
columns.description: The server-side encryption key that is used to protect your backups.

columns.name: number_of_recovery_points
columns.description: The number of recovery points that are stored in a backup vault.

columns.name: sns_topic_arn
columns.description: An ARN that uniquely identifies an Amazon Simple Notification Service.

columns.name: policy
columns.description: The backup vault access policy document in JSON format.

columns.name: policy_std
columns.description: Contains the backup vault access policy document in a canonical form for easier searching.

columns.name: backup_vault_events
columns.description: An array of events that indicate the status of jobs to back up resources to the backup vault.
